medical_history.chief_complaint: Gradual onset of abdominal pain, currently worsening in the right lower quadrant (RLQ).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced gradual onset of abdominal pain starting on an unspecified date. Initially, the pain was generalized but has since localized more to the left upper quadrant (LUQ) and RLQ, currently worst in the RLQ with tenderness upon palpation. The patient denies chills, nausea, or vomiting, and reports bowel and urinary habits at baseline. There was a subjective low-grade fever yesterday, which has resolved, and the patient currently feels well.
